description: Numbers n such that n!!! + 1 is prime (0 is included by convention).
comments: n!!! = n(n-3)(n-6)(n-9)...The search for multifactorial primes started by Ray Ballinger is now continued by a team of volunteers on the website of Ken Davis (see link).
links: Ray Ballinger, Status of Search for Multifactorial Primes
Ken Davis, Status of Search for Multifactorial Primes.
Index entries for sequences related to factorial numbers
author: _G. L. Honaker, Jr._
extensions: Corrected and extended by _Hugo Pfoertner_, Jun 25 2003
